doc.after: The commanding officer at the USMA is the Superintendent. In recent years, the position of Superintendent has been held by a Lieutenant General (three star general). The current Superintendent, Lieutenant General Robert L. Caslen, Jr., took command on 17 July 2013.[101] Earlier in his career, Caslen served as the 70th commandant of Cadets. The academy is a direct reporting unit, and as such, the Superintendent reports directly to the Army Chief of Staff (CSA).[102][103]
